title: The Gift From Little Raccoon: A Pandemic Tale
description: Little Raccoon is on a mission to find a gift for his friend, the girl. She doesn’t leave her house much anymore, not even for school and she is so sad. He’s worried about her and misses seeing her happy. If only he can find just the right thing. A story about taking care of your friends. For ages 0-5
author: Carolyn Watson-Dubisch
